prop.caption: type
prop.description: The type of method used to connect to the server. Defaults to 'binding'

prop.caption: poll-timeout
prop.description: The number of milliseconds between each poll-request

prop.caption: resource
prop.description: Name that will identify this client as it logs on the the Jabber network. Defaults to the application name.

prop.caption: auto-register
prop.description: Specifies if an entered username should be registered on the Jabber network automatically. Defaults to 'false'.

prop.caption: auto-accept
prop.description: Specifies if an icoming presence subscription request should be accepted automatically. Defaults to 'true'

prop.caption: auto-deny
prop.description: Specifies if an icoming presence subscription request should be denied automatically. Defaults to 'false'

prop.caption: model
prop.description: Name of the model where roster and (chat) messages will be synchronized to.

prop.caption: model-contents
prop.description: Specifies the items that will be stored inside the model. Defaults to 'all'

prop.caption: muc-host
prop.description: Domain name of the Multi User Chat service of an XMPP server. Defaults to the domain that is parsed from {@link element.xmpp.url}.

prop.caption: muc-model
prop.description: Name of the model where chat messages sent and received from Multi User Chats will be synchronized to.

prop.caption: rdb-host
prop.description: Domain name of the Remote DataBindingservice of an XMPP server. Defaults to the domain that is parsed from {@link element.xmpp.url}.

prop.caption: rdb-model
prop.description: Name of the model where Remote DataBinding messages will be synchronized to.

prop.caption: rdb-bot
prop.description: Specifies if the this client will connect to the XMPP server as a bot

prop.caption: url
prop.description: the location of the server that is recipient of the rpc messages.

prop.caption: route-server
prop.description: String specifying the url to the route script.

prop.caption: autoroute
prop.description: whether the call should be routed through a proxy when a permission error occurs due to the same domein policy.

prop.caption: timeout
prop.description: the number of milliseconds after which the call is considered timed out.

prop.caption: authfailure
prop.description: Fires when the authentication process failed or halted.

prop.caption: connectionerror
prop.description: Fires when the connection with the XMPP server dropped.

prop.caption: connected
prop.description: Fires when a login attempt has succeeded, and a session has been setup.

prop.caption: receivechat
prop.description: Fires when the user received a chat message from a contact.

prop.caption: datachange
prop.description: Fires when a data-change message is received from one of the contacts.

prop.caption: propertychange
prop.description: Fires when a property changes.

prop.caption: error
prop.description: Fires when a communication error occurs.
